short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Format LaTeX code easily within your browser. Just paste your LaTeX text, and the formatted text will be copied to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool to tidy up your LaTeX. Paste in your messy code, get back neat formatting. Easy peasy.

What it does:
- Formats your LaTeX
- Copies the result to your clipboard
- Saves you time and headaches

Great for students, researchers, or anyone who uses LaTeX and likes things tidy.

Why bother with formatting?

Let's face it, LaTeX can get messy. This little extension helps keep your code clean without the fuss. It's like having a neat freak friend who actually enjoys organizing your LaTeX.

How to use it:
1. Click the extension
2. Paste your LaTeX
3. Watch the magic happen
4. It's already on your clipboard, ready to go

Whether you're knee-deep in equations or drowning in bibliography entries, this formatter's got your back.

What's in it for you:
- Less time fiddling with indentation
- Easier to spot mistakes
- Your collaborators might actually enjoy reading your code

What it can handle

This formatter isn't picky. It'll happily tidy up all sorts of LaTeX elements:
- Equations (even the gnarly ones)
- Tables and figures
- Custom environments
- Bibliographies

It plays nice with whatever LaTeX editor you're using.

Why give it a shot?
- It's quick
- It's simple
- It does the job without any fuss

Whether LaTeX is your best friend or your worst enemy, this formatter can make your life a little easier.

Give it a try - your future self (and your project partners) will thank you!
